titles.title: School Hunger Elimination Act of 2019
School Hunger Elimination Act of 2019
A bill to amend the Richard B. Russell National School Lunch Act to improve program requirements, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Agriculture, Nutrition, and Forestry.

bill.summary:
School Hunger Elimination Act of 2019
This bill revises requirements under the National School Lunch Program and the School Breakfast Program of the Department of Agriculture, including by expanding mandatory direct certification of low-income children for free or reduced-price meals.
